<font face="calibri,helvetica,arial,sans-serif" size="3">

<p align="justify">*Fire Dynamics Simulator (FDS)* is a large-eddy simulation (LES) code for low-speed flows, with an emphasis on smoke and heat transport from fires.

*Smokeview (SMV)* is a visualization program used to display the output of FDS and [http://cfast.nist.gov CFAST] simulations.

*FDS+Evac* is the evacuation simulation module for FDS.</p>

</font>

<br>
